comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
Mrs. Stokes' husband, Walter C. Stokes, was a New York stockbroker; Mrs. Schiff's husband was Mortimer L. Schiff (1877-1931), a banker active in the Boy Scouts of America.

Same location, same day (you can see Mrs. Billings and Mrs. Johnson on the left, in the same hats as this photo):
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3681839693/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Another photo shows Mrs. Schiff with her husband: memory.loc.gov/service/pnp/ggbain/13700/13753r.jpg These photos show members of New York society at the Piping Rock Country Club, in Locust Valley, Long Island.

comment._content: Believe this was from the same show? www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3477947435/size...

comment._content: Another view at the same grandstand with Mr. & Mrs Schiff: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3842832314/in/p...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: @Pony Meredith: Your photo appears to show the same venue, but on a different date. This photo was taken on 7/10/13; yours is dated a month earlier, 6-9-13.
